```diff
  // Inspired by react-hot-toast library
  import * as React from "react"
+ import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
  
  import type {
    }
  }
+ 
+ type ToastVariant = 'default' | 'success' | 'destructive'
+ 
+ interface ToastProps {
+   title: string
+   description?: string
+   variant?: ToastVariant
+   duration?: number
+ }
+ 
+ export function useToast() {
+   const [toasts, setToasts] = useState<(ToastProps & { id: string })[]>([])
+ 
+   const toast = ({ title, description, variant = 'default', duration = 5000 }: ToastProps) => {
+     const id = Math.random().toString(36).slice(2, 9)
+     setToasts((prev) => [...prev, { id, title, description, variant, duration }])
+     
+     setTimeout(() => {
+       setToasts((prev) => prev.filter((toast) => toast.id !== id))
+     }, duration)
+   }
+ 
+   return {
+     toast,
+     toasts,
+     dismiss: (id: string) => setToasts((prev) => prev.filter((toast) => toast.id !== id)),
+   }
+ }
  
  export { useToast, toast }
```

const Toast = React.forwardRef<HTMLDivElement, ToastProps>(({ className, variant = "default", ...props }, ref) => { return ( <div ref={ref} className={cn("group pointer-events-auto relative flex w-full items-center justify-between space-x-4 overflow-hidden rounded-md border p-4 pr-8 shadow-lg transition-all", variant === "default" && "bg-white border-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:border-gray-700", variant === "success" && "bg-green-50 border-green-200 dark:bg-green-900/20 dark:border-green-900/30", variant === "destructive" && "bg-red-50 border-red-200 dark:bg-red-900/20 dark:border-red-900/30", className )} {...props} /> ) }); Toast.displayName = "Toast"; const ToastAction = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => ( <button ref={ref} className={cn("inline-flex h-8 shrink-0 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-200 bg-transparent px-3 text-sm font-medium transition-colors hover:bg-gray-100 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 dark:border-gray-700 dark:hover:bg-gray-800 dark:focus:ring-gray-400", className )} {...props} /> ));
```diff
- 
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import React from 'react'
+ import { useToast } from '@/hooks/use-toast'
+ import { Toast, ToastTitle, ToastDescription } from '@/components/ui/toast'
+ 
+ export function ToastProvider() {
+   const { toasts, dismiss } = useToast()
+ 
+   if (!toasts.length) return null
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className="fixed top-0 right-0 z-50 flex flex-col items-end p-4 space-y-4">
+       {toasts.map((toast) => (
+         <Toast 
+           key={toast.id} 
+           variant={toast.variant}
+           className="max-w-md"
+           onClick={() => dismiss(toast.id)}
+         >
+           <div>
+             <ToastTitle>{toast.title}</ToastTitle>
+             {toast.description && (
+               <ToastDescription>{toast.description}</ToastDescription>
+             )}
+           </div>
+         </Toast>
+       ))}
+     </div>
+   )
+ } 
```

```diff
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import React, { useState } from 'react'
  import { Layout } from "@/components/layout"
+ import { useToast } from '@/hooks/use-toast'
  
  export default function Analytics() {
+   const [channelUrl, setChannelUrl] = useState('')
+   const [apiKey, setApiKey] = useState('')
+   const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false)
+   const { toast } = useToast()
+ 
+   const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => {
+     e.preventDefault()
+     
+     if (!channelUrl) {
+       toast({
+         title: "ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼",
+         description: "ãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒãƒ«URLã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„",
+         variant: "destructive"
+       })
+       return
+     }
+

+       toast({
+         title: "ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼",
+         description: "API Keyã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„",
+         variant: "destructive"
+       })
+       return
+     }
+ 
+     setIsLoading(true)
+     
+     // APIã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚·ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆ
+     setTimeout(() => {
+       toast({
+         title: "æˆåŠŸ",
+         description: "åˆ†æãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’å—ã‘ä»˜ã‘ã¾ã—ãŸ",
+         variant: "success"
+       })
+       setIsLoading(false)
+     }, 1500)
+   }
+ 
    return (
      <Layout>
        <div className="max-w-xl mx-auto">
          <div className="bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 p-8 rounded-lg shadow">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-semibold mb-6">YouTubeåˆ†æã‚’é–‹å§‹</h2>
-           <form className="space-y-6">
+           <form className="space-y-6" onSubmit={handleSubmit}>

                  className="w-full p-2 border rounded-md"
                  placeholder="https://www.youtube.com/@username"
+                 value={channelUrl}
+                 onChange={(e) => setChannelUrl(e.target.value)}
                />
              </div>
                  className="w-full p-2 border rounded-md"
                  placeholder="ã‚ãªãŸã®APIã‚­ãƒ¼ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„"
+                 value={apiKey}
+                 onChange={(e) => setApiKey(e.target.value)}

+               disabled={isLoading}
              >
-               åˆ†æé–‹å§‹
+               {isLoading ? 'å‡¦ç†ä¸­...' : 'åˆ†æé–‹å§‹'}
              </button>
            </form>
```

ã“ã‚Œã§åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªTube Naviãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ãŸã‚ˆï¼ğŸ’•âœ¨

```diff
- import * as React from "react"; import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"; export interface ToastProps extends React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement> { variant?: "default" | "success" | "destructive" }; export interface ToastActionElement extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement> {}; const Toast = React.forwardRef<HTMLDivElement, ToastProps>(({ className, variant = "default", ...props }, ref) => { return ( <div ref={ref} className={cn("group pointer-events-auto relative flex w-full items-center justify-between space-x-4 overflow-hidden rounded-md border p-4 pr-8 shadow-lg transition-all", variant === "default" && "bg-white border-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:border-gray-700", variant === "success" && "bg-green-50 border-green-200 dark:bg-green-900/20 dark:border-green-900/30", variant === "destructive" && "bg-red-50 border-red-200 dark:bg-red-900/20 dark:border-red-900/30", className )} {...props} /> ) }); Toast.displayName = "Toast"; const ToastAction = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => ( <button ref={ref} className={cn("inline-flex h-8 shrink-0 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-200 bg-transparent px-3 text-sm font-medium transition-colors hover:bg-gray-100 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 dark:border-gray-700 dark:hover:bg-gray-800 dark:focus:ring-gray-400", className )} {...props} /> )); ToastAction.displayName = "ToastAction"; const ToastTitle = React.forwardRef<HTMLParagraphElement, React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLHeadingElement>>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => ( <p ref={ref} className={cn("text-sm font-medium", className)} {...props} /> )); ToastTitle.displayName = "ToastTitle"; const ToastDescription = React.forwardRef<HTMLParagraphElement, React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLParagraphElement>>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => ( <p ref={ref} className={cn("text-sm opacity-90", className)} {...props} /> )); ToastDescription.displayName = "ToastDescription"; export { Toast, ToastAction, ToastTitle, ToastDescription };
+ import * as React from "react";
+ import { cn } from "@/lib/utils";
+ import { ToastVariant } from "@/hooks/use-toast";
+ 
+ export interface ToastProps extends React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement> {
+   variant?: ToastVariant;
+ }
+ 
+ export interface ToastActionElement extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement> {};
+ 
+ const Toast = React.forwardRef<HTMLDivElement, ToastProps>(({ className, variant = "default", ...props }, ref) => {
+   return (
+     <div
+       ref={ref}
+       className={cn(
+         "group pointer-events-auto relative flex w-full items-center justify-between space-x-4 overflow-hidden rounded-md border p-4 pr-8 shadow-lg transition-all",
+         variant === "default" && "bg-white border-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:border-gray-700",
+         variant === "success" && "bg-green-50 border-green-200 dark:bg-green-900/20 dark:border-green-900/30",
+         variant === "destructive" && "bg-red-50 border-red-200 dark:bg-red-900/20 dark:border-red-900/30",
+         className
+       )}
+       {...props}
+     />
+   );
+ });
+ Toast.displayName = "Toast";
+ 
+ const ToastAction = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
+   <button
+     ref={ref}
+     className={cn(
+       "inline-flex h-8 shrink-0 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-200 bg-transparent px-3 text-sm font-medium transition-colors hover:bg-gray-100 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-400 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 dark:border-gray-700 dark:hover:bg-gray-800 dark:focus:ring-gray-400",
+       className
+     )}
+     {...props}
+   />
+ ));
+ ToastAction.displayName = "ToastAction";
+ 
+ const ToastTitle = React.forwardRef<HTMLParagraphElement, React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLHeadingElement>>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
+   <p
+     ref={ref}
+     className={cn("text-sm font-medium", className)}
+     {...props}
+   />
+ ));
+ ToastTitle.displayName = "ToastTitle";
+ 
+ const ToastDescription = React.forwardRef<HTMLParagraphElement, React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLParagraphElement>>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
+   <p
+     ref={ref}
+     className={cn("text-sm opacity-90", className)}
+     {...props}
+   />
+ ));
+ ToastDescription.displayName = "ToastDescription";
+ 
+ export { Toast, ToastAction, ToastTitle, ToastDescription };
  
```
